concept.display: Neoplasm of breast regional lymph node staging category N0: No regional lymph node metastasis
pN0: No regional lymph node metastasis histologically (i.e., none greater than 0.2 mm), no additional examination for isolated tumor cells (breast) (finding)
Neoplasm of breast regional lymph node staging category pN0 as per American Joint Committee on Cancer 7th edition (finding)
pN0(i-): No regional lymph node metastasis histologically, negative morphologic findings for isolated tumor cells (breast) (finding)
Neoplasm of breast regional lymph node staging category pN0(i-): No regional lymph node metastasis histologically, negative immunohistochemically (finding)
pN0(i+): No regional lymph node metastasis histologically, positive morphologic findings for isolated tumor cells, no cluster greater than 0.2 mm (breast) (finding)
Neoplasm of breast regional lymph node staging category pN0(i+): Regional lymph node isolated tumor cell clusters detected by hematoxylin and eosin stain or immunohistochemical methods (finding)
pN0(mol-): No regional lymph node metastasis histologically, negative nonmorphologic (molecular) findings for isolated tumor cells (breast) (finding)
pN0(mol+): No regional lymph node metastasis histologically, positive nonmorphologic (molecular) findings for isolated tumor cells (breast) (finding)
Neoplasm of breast regional lymph node staging category pN0(mol+): Positive molecular findings, but no regional lymph node metastasis detected by histology or immunohistochemistry (finding)
